titleInfo.title: ‘Route map of the special mission to Seistan and Mekran, from Ispahan to Gwadur by Quarter Master Sergeant David Bower, Royal Engineers. To accompany the Journal of Capn. C. Bean Euan Smith, Personal Assistant to Major-General J.T. Goldsmid, C.B.’

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:193 x 945 mm, on sheet 317 x 994 mm

mods.abstract: Imprint:London, Trel. Saunders lith.Distinctive Features:Relief shown by hachures.Route of mission indicated in red line.Boundaries of provinces labelled and shown by pecked line.Original manuscript at IOR/X/3126/1.
